title: 2 BR / 1 BA, Fully Fenced Private Backyard! Campbell Pruneyard Area,
posting_body: ["Hello, I'm Camar and I'd like to welcome you to the West Valley Drive Apartment Homes!", 'Coming available September 1st or sooner is a beautiful renovated, very spacious 2 Bedroom, 1 Bathroom apartment-home with a fully fenced private backyard, two parking spaces and extra storage.', 'Contact me to schedule a tour and get this one time opportunity of a great apartment home in a very central Silicon Valley location.', 'Features', '- Private Fully Fenced Backyard', '- 2 Free Dedicated Parking Spaces - Includes Covered Parking', '- 2 Bed / 1 Bath Apt.', 'Home', '- Very Spacious (900 Sq.', 'Ft.!)', '- Heating and Air Conditioning', '- New recessed lighting', "- USB power outlets in living and bedroom's", '- New Luxury Vinyl Plank Flooring', '- Quartz Kitchen Counters', '- Walk in Pantry', '- Coat closet', '- Very large wall bedroom closets', '- Linen closet', '- Vibrant new paint scheme', '- Free additional storage', '- Laundry care center in building', '- Responsive management', 'Water, sewer, garbage, and gas are included!', '  You do not need to pay for these.', 'We are conveniently located near highway 17 and 85, with easy access to highway 280 and 880, in beautiful and historic Campbell, California on a nice quiet street.', "We're in a great school district and just a few minutes away from many Silicon Valley campuses, the Pruneyard Shopping Center, wonderful Downtown Campbell, many hiking and biking trails and more!", 'Take advantage of all that Campbell has to offer and come see why our Residents love West Valley Drive Apartments.', 'I look forward to hearing from you soon!', 'West Valley Apartments', 'show contact info', '*Some pets allowed - please inquire.', '*Pictures are of similar unit']
